response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which we believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and capabilities, we estimate its value to be well above market standards. We are offering this exceptional product to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a special opportunity tailored for someone with discerning needs like yours. Should you find this proposal appealing, please let us know so we can proceed with the details.", "product_price": 950000}
